tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE doctors (doctor_id INT NOT NULL, doctor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, specialization VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (doctor_id));

CREATE TABLE appointments (
	appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	appointment_date DATE,
	doctor_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
	schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	doctor_id INT,
	available_date DATE,
	start_time TIME,
	end_time TIME,
	FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
);
